attributes.action: Regulate airport parking charges to stop airports charging stupid prices!
attributes.additional_details: Stop Airports ripping peoples eyes out, £51.99 for an overnight stay???
attributes.background: The Goverment must step in to level off the economy and stop airports from charging masses amounts to park your car at airport, regardless whether it’s private owned or not, the Goverment helped airports so much during lockdowns, so why should we brunt any recovery costs?

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about private parking charges are a matter for the car park operator, not the UK Government or Parliament.
